H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H6666.def: = something that one considers one's rightful due

H3444.def: = causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success

H1540.def: = action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H7676.def: = the seventh day of the week, which is a day of rest during which the people are not to do any work

H2490.def: = action by which priests disqualify themselves for religious service ◄ by unlawful behavior

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H5236.def: = state in which something is associated with a nation or country that is different from one's own

H3867.def: = action by which humans associate themselves with another human, a group of people, or a deity for a particular purpose

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H914.def: = action by which part of an entity is separated from the rest, either by detaching it completely it or by creating a kind of barrier (visible or invisible) between the selected part and the rest of the entity

H5631.def: = a male who has been castrated and made to serve in the women's quarters in the royal palace

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3002.def: = state in which objects are free from moisture

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5631.def: = a male who has been castrated and made to serve in the women's quarters in the royal palace

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7676.def: = the seventh day of the week, which is a day of rest during which the people are not to do any work

H977.def: = action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events

H2654.def: = state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H2346.def: = structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H5236.def: = state in which something is associated with a nation or country that is different from one's own

H3867.def: = action by which humans associate themselves with another human, a group of people, or a deity for a particular purpose

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H7676.def: = the seventh day of the week, which is a day of rest during which the people are not to do any work

H2490.def: = action by which priests disqualify themselves for religious service ◄ by unlawful behavior

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H8055.def: = state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H8605.def: = action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness

H2077.def: = the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and the other part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

H7522.def: = state in which deities or humans in a position of authority are favorable disposed towards a person or activity

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3069.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H5080.def: = state in which one's hand, which holds an instrument like an axe, is raised ► with the purpose of striking it against another object

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H857.def: = to move to a certain location, seen from that location's perspective

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H3293.def: = a large group of trees or shrubs which grow close together and where several wild animals are known to live; ≈ considered to be a dangerous place for humans and domestic animals

H6822.def: = action by which humans or deities watch attentitvely to monitor people and places

H5787.def: = state in which a person or animal is unable to see

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H483.def: = state in which humans or animals are unable to speak ◄ because of a physical limitation or because of emotions

H3611.def: = relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a {L:pig<SDBH:חֲזִיר>}; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H5024.def: = action by which animals produce a barking sound

H1957.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = process by which someone is asleep or half-asleep and utters unintelligible sounds

H7901.def: = state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H5123.def: = state in which humans or animals are in a state of a relatively light sleep; ≈ sometimes associated with death, sometimes with being inactive

H3611.def: = relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a {L:pig<SDBH:חֲזִיר>}; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

H5794.def: = state in which a person, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H7654.def: = state in which there is an abundance of a certain commodity

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H995.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H6437.def: = action by which humans or animals turn their body to face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H1215.def: = possessions accumulated through advantageous transactions, in which part of the income can be kept for oneself, mostly achieved in an unjust way

H857.def: = to move to a certain location, seen from that location's perspective

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H7941.def: = alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of dates through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness{N:001}

H4279.def: = a reference to the day after the current day

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3499.def: = what remains in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way; used for humans, animals, plants, and inanimate objects
